welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Apache Junction, where the charm of the Old West meets modern-day adventures! Get ready to explore our beautiful desert landscapes, rich history, and vibrant local culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Williams Gateway Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A small terminal primarily used by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights, with a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
